errors.addReferenceError: An error occurred while adding an object.
errors.removeReferenceError: An error occurred while removing an object.
errors.checkValidityError: An error occurred while checking the validity of the references.

help-tooltip.title: What is happening here?
help-tooltip.question1: What should I do in this view?
help-tooltip.answer1: In this area, you enter the contract references of the assistants assigned to you.
help-tooltip.answer2: A reference ID is a unique code referencing your assistants' contract in Clock which allows you to view their timesheets.
help-tooltip.question3: Where do I get a reference ID?
help-tooltip.answer3: A reference ID is generated upon the creation of a contract in Clock. The assistant must send it to you.
help-tooltip.question4: I have too many reference IDs - are they all valid?
help-tooltip.answer4: If many of these references accumulate over time, you can remove invalid references with {checkValidityButton} button.
help-tooltip.question5: When does an ID become invalid?
help-tooltip.answer5: A reference becomes invalid if a contract is expired, deleted or if the student assistant generated a new ID.
